@155A *, ,TING NGE 'DZIN DES RNAM PAR SPYOD PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO NI MYUR DU BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR
RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB TU MNGON PAR RDZOGS PAR 'TSANG RGYA'O,
,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU DE DAG NI BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RNAMS KYI TING NGE 'DZIN TE, TING

NGE 'DZIN DE DAG GIS RNAM PAR SPYOD PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RNAMS NI MYUR DU BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR
RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB TU MNGON PAR RDZOGS PAR 'TSANG RGYA STE,
DE LTAR TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, GZUNGS KYI SGO GANG LA BSLABS PAS,
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RNAMS MYUR

DU BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB TU MNGON PAR
RDZOGS PAR 'TSANG RGYA BAR 'GYUR BA DE LTA BU TSAD MED GRANGS MED
PA GZHAN DAG KYANG YOD DE, DE LA DPA' BAR 'GRO BA ZHES BYA BA'I
TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG GIS TING NGE
'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI SPYOD YUL NYAMS SU MYONG BAR 'GYUR PA STE,

DE NI DPA' BAR 'GRO BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN ZHES BYA'O,
,DE LA RIN CHEN PHYAG RGYA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE
NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG GIS TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD RGYAS GDAB
PAR 'GYUR BA STE, DE NI RIN CHEN PHYAG RGYA ZHES BYA BA'I TING
NGE 'DZIN ZHES BYA'O, ,DE BZHIN DU DE LA NAM MKHA' LTAR CHAGS PA

MED PA'I RNAM PAR GROL ZHING GOS PA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I BAR GYI
TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS NA CHOS
THAMS CAD LA NAM MKHA' LTAR CHAGS PA MED CING RNAM PAR GROL BAS
GOS PA MED PA RJES SU THOB PAR 'GYUR BA STE, DE NI NAM MKHA' LTAR
CHAGS PA MED PAS RNAM PAR GROL ZHING

GOS PA MED PA'I TING NGE 'DZIN ZHES BYA BA'I BAR DU'O ZHES BYA BA
NI CHOS KYI MCHOG CHUNG NGU'I DMIGS PA DANG RNAM PA'I KHYAD PAR
YIN NO, ,DE NAS SANGS RGYAS KYI MTHUS TSE DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR
GYIS, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU LA 'DI SKAD CES SMRAS SO,
,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS

DPA' CHEN PO GANG TING NGE 'DZIN DE DAG GI GNAS PA NI SNGON GYI
DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS
RGYAS RNAMS KYIS KYANG, BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I
BYANG CHUB TU LUNG BSTAN TO, ,DA LTAR PHYOGS BCU'I 'JIG RTEN GYI
KHAMS GANGG'A'I KLUNG GI BYE MA SNYED DAG NA,

@155B DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I
SANGS RGYAS BZHUGS SHING 'TSO SKYONG BA GANG DAG YIN PA DE DAG
GIS KYANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DE LUNG BSTAN
TE, DES NI TING NGE 'DZIN YANG YANG DAG PAR RJES SU MI MTHONG,
BDAG NI SNYOMS PAR ZHUGS SO ZHES BYA BAR

TING NGE 'DZIN DES RLOM SEMS SU 'GYUR BA YANG MED DO, ,DES NI
TING NGE 'DZIN YANG YANG DAG PAR RJES SU MI MTHONG NGO, ,BDAG NI
SNYOMS PAR 'JUG GO, ,BDAG GIS MNYAM PAR GZHAG PAR BYA'O, ,BDAG NI
MNYAM PAR GZHAG PAR GYUR TO ZHES RLOM SEMS SU 'GYUR BA MED DE, DE
LA RNAM PAR

RTOG PA DE DAG MED CING MI RGYU'O ZHES BYA BA NI CHOS KYI MCHOG
'BRING GI DMIGS PA DANG RNAM PA'I KHYAD PAR YIN NO, ,SH'A RI'I
BUS SMRAS PA, TSE DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR CI TING NGE 'DZIN 'DI LA
GNAS PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO LA, DE BZHIN
GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR

RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS RNAMS KYIS LUNG BSTAN PA YOD DAM, RAB
'BYOR GYIS SMRAS PA, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU DE NI MED DE,
DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU 'DI LTAR SHES
RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA YANG GZHAN LA TING NGE 'DZIN YANG
GZHAN, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' YANG GZHAN ZHES BYA BA

MED KYI, SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA NYID KYANG TING NGE
'DZIN TE, TING NGE 'DZIN NYID KYANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'O, ,BYANG
CHUB SEMS DPA' NYID KYANG TING NGE 'DZIN TE, ,SMRAS PA, TSE DANG
LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR GAL TE DE LTAR TING NGE 'DZIN KYANG GZHAN LA,
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' YANG GZHAN ZHES BYA BA MED,

BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' YANG GZHAN LA, TING NGE 'DZIN NYID KYANG
GZHAN ZHES BYA BA MED DE, CHOS THAMS CAD MNYAM PA NYID KYI PHYIR
TING NGE 'DZIN NYID KYANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' NYID KYANG TING NGE 'DZIN YIN NA, DE LA TING NGE 'DZIN BSTAN
PAR NUS SAM, RAB 'BYOR GYIS SMRAS PA,

TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU DE NI MA YIN NO, ,SMRAS PA, TSE
DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR RIGS KYI BU DE TING NGE 'DZIN DE LA 'DU
SHES SU BYED DAM, RAB 'BYOR GYIS SMRAS PA, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A
RI'I BU 'DU SHES SU BYED PA MED DO, ,SMRAS PA, JI LTAR DE LA 'DU
SHES SU BYED PAR MI 'GYUR, RAB 'BYOR GYIS

@156A *, ,SMRAS PA, JI LTAR RNAM PAR RTOG PA MED PA LTAR RO,
,SMRAS PA DE LA JI LTAR RTOG PA MED PA YIN, RAB 'BYOR GYIS SMRAS
PA, CHOS THAMS CAD MED PA'I PHYIR RTAG PA MED DE, DE LTAR NA TING
NGE 'DZIN DE LA RTOG PA MED DO, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU
RNAM GRANGS DES NA, RIGS

KYI BU DE TING NGE 'DZIN DE LA RNAM PAR SHES PAR BYED PA MED DO,
,'DU SHES SU BYED PA MED DO, ,SMRAS PA, CI'I PHYIR RNAM PAR SHES
PAR BYED PA MED CING, 'DU SHES SU 'GYUR BA MED, RAB 'BYOR GYIS
SMRAS PA, TING NGE 'DZIN DE YANG MED LA BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS
DPA' CHEN PO DE YANG MED PA'I PHYIR,

RNAM PAR SHES PA MED DO, ,'DU SHES SU 'GYUR BA MED DO ZHES BYA BA
NI CHOS KYI MCHOG CHEN PO'I DMIGS PA DANG RNAM PA'I KHYAD PAR YIN
NO, ,DE NAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS, TSE DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR LA
LEGS SO ZHES BYA BA GNANG STE, JI LTAR KHYOD NYON MONGS PA MED PA
LA GNAS PA RNAMS KYI MCHOG TU BSTAN

PA LTAR STON PA NI LEGS SO, ,LEGS SO, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS
DPA' CHEN POS, DE LTAR SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA BSLAB
PAR BYA'O, ,DE LTAR BSAM GTAN GYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG,
BRTZON 'GRUS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA DANG, TSUL KHRIMS KYI

PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA BSLAB
PAR BYA'O, ,DE LTAR BYANG CHUB KYI PHYOGS KYI CHOS RNAMS DANG,
SANGS RGYAS KYI CHOS MA 'DRES PA BCO BRGYAD KYI BAR LA BSLAB PAR
BYA'O, ,DE NAS TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BUS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS LA
'DI SKAD CES GSOL TO, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE LTAR

SLOB PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO SHES RAB KYI PHA
ROL TU PHYIN PA LA SLOB PA LAGS SAM, BSAM GTAN GYI PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA DANG, BRTZON 'GRUS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, BZOD
PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN
PA DANG, SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA SLOB PA

LAGS SAM, BYANG CHUB KYI PHYOGS KYI CHOS RNAMS DANG, SANGS RGYAS
KYI CHOS MA 'DRES PA RNAMS KYI BAR LA SLOB PA LAGS SAM, BCOM LDAN
'DAS KYIS BKA' STZAL PA, SH'A RI'I BU BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS
DPA' CHEN PO DE LTAR SLOB PA NI, SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA
LA MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL

@156B GYIS SLOB PA YIN, BSAM GTAN GYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG,
BRTZON 'GRUS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA DANG, TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, SBYIN
PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS SLOB PA YIN,
BYANG CHUB KYI PHYOGS KYI CHOS RNAMS DANG, BSAM

GTAN DANG, TSAD MED PA DANG, GZUGS MED PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA
DANG, STOBS BCU DANG, MI 'JIGS PA BZHI DANG, SO SO YANG DAG PAR
RIG PA BZHI DANG, SANGS RGYAS KYI CHOS MA 'DRES PA BCO BRGYAD KYI
BAR LA MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS SLOB PA YIN NO, ,DE NAS TSE DANG
LDAN PA SH'A

RI'I BUS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS LA 'DI SKAD CES GSOL TO, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DE LTAR SHES RAB KYI PHA
ROL TU PHYIN PA LA SLOB PA NI MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS SLOB PA
LAGS SAM, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS BKA' STZAL PA, SH'A RI'I BU BYANG
CHUB

SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DE LTAR SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN
PA LA MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS SLOB PA YIN NO, ,SH'A RI'I BUS GSOL
PA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS CI'I SLAD DU MI DMIGS PA LAGS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS
KYIS BKA' STZAL PA, SH'A RI'I BU SHIN TU RNAM PAR DAG PA'I PHYIR
BDAG MI

DMIGS SO, ,SHIN TU RNAM PAR DAG PA'I PHYIR SEMS CAN DANG, SROG
DANG, GSO BA DANG, SKYES BU DANG, GANG ZAG DANG, SHED LAS SKYES
DANG, SHED BU DANG, BYED PA PO DANG, TSOR PA PO DANG, SHES PA PO
DANG, MTHONG BA PO MI DMIGS SO, ,SHIN TU RNAM PAR DAG PA'I PHYIR
SDUG BSNGAL MI DMIGS

SO, ,SHIN TU RNAM PAR DAG PA'I PHYIR KUN 'BYUNG BA DANG, 'GOG PA
DANG, LAM MI DMIGS SO, ,SHIN TU RNAM PAR DAG PA'I PHYIR, 'DOD

MED PA'I

DANG, TSAD MED PA DANG, GZUGS MED PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA MI
DMIGS SO, ,SHIN TU RNAM PAR DAG PA'I PHYIR, DRAN PA NYE BAR GZHAG
PA DANG, YANG DAG PAR SPONG BA DANG, RDZU 'PHRUL GYI RKANG PA
DANG, DBANG PO DANG,

@157A *, ,STOBS DANG, BYANG CHUB KYI YAN LAG DANG, LAM MI DMIGS
SO, ,SHIN TU RNAM PAR DAG PA'I PHYIR, PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA RNAMS
MI DMIGS SO, ,SHIN TU RNAM PAR DAG PA'I PHYIR, STOBS BCU DANG, MI
'JIGS PA BZHI DANG, SO SO YANG DAG PAR RIG PA BZHI DANG,

DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I STOBS BCU MI DMIGS SO, ,SHIN TU RNAM PAR DAG
PA'I PHYIR, SANGS RGYAS KYI CHOS MA 'DRES PA RNAMS MI DMIGS SO,
,SHIN TU RNAM PAR DAG PA'I PHYIR, RGYUN TU ZHUGS PA MI DMIGS SO,
,SHIN TU RNAM PAR DAG PA'I PHYIR, LAN CIG PHYIR 'ONG BA DANG,
PHYIR MI 'ONG

BA DANG, DGRA BCOM PA DANG, RANG SANGS RGYAS MI DMIGS SO, ,SHIN
TU RNAM PAR DAG PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' MI DMIGS SO,
,SHIN TU RNAM PAR DAG PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB MI DMIGS SO, ,SHIN
TU RNAM PAR DAG PA'I PHYIR, SANGS RGYAS MI DMIGS SO, ,GSOL PA,
BCOM

LDAN 'DAS RNAM PAR DAG PA GANG LAGS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS BKA'
STZAL PA, CHOS THAMS CAD MA SKYES PA DANG, 'BYUNG BA MED PA DANG,
DMIGS PA MED PA DANG, MNGON PAR 'DU BYA BA MED PA 'DI NI RNAM PAR
DAG PA ZHES BYA STE, SH'A RI'I BU DE LTAR NA, BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' SEMS

DPA' CHEN PO CHOS THAMS CAD LA MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS SLOB PA
YIN NO ZHES BYA BA NI RNAM PAR RTOG PA DANG LDAN PA SPYI'I DBANG
DU BYAS NAS BSTAN PA YIN NO, ,GSOL PA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE LTAR
SLOB PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO CHOS GANG DANG
GANG LA SLOB PA LAGS,

BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS BKA' STZAL PA, SH'A RI'I BU DE LTAR SLOB PA'I
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO NI CHOS GANG LA YANG SLOB
PA MED DO, ,DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, SH'A RI'I BU CHOS 'DI DAG NI,
BYIS PA SO SO'I SKYE BOS JI LTAR MNGON PAR CHAGS PAR BYA BA DE
LTA BU'I RNAM PA YOD PA MA YIN NO, ,

GSOL PA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS 'O NA CHOS 'DI DAG RNAM PA JI LTAR MCHIS
PA LAGS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS BKA' STZAL PA, JI LTAR MID PA DE
LTAR YOD DE, DE LTAR YOD PA MA YIN PA DE'I PHYIR MED CES BYA'O
ZHES BYA BA NI DROD DU GTOGS PA'I RNAM PAR RTOG PA DANG LDAN PA'I
DANG PO MA RIG PA'I RTOG PA

@157B YIN NO, ,GSOL PA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS CI'I SLAD DU MCHIS PA MA
LAGS PAS MA MCHIS PA ZHES BGYI, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS BKA' STZAL
PA, SH'A RI'I BU GZUGS NANG STONG PA NYID DANG, DNGOS PO MED PA'I
NGO BO NYID STONG PA NYID KYI BAR GYI PHYIR YOD PA MA YIN NO,
,TSOR BA DANG, 'DU

SHES DANG, 'DU BYED RNAMS DANG, RNAM PAR SHES PA NANG STONG PA
NYID DANG, DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO NYID STONG PA NYID KYI BAR
GYI PHYIR YOD PA MA YIN NO, ,BYANG CHUB KYI PHYOGS KYI CHOS RNAMS
KYI BAR DU NANG STONG PA NYID DANG, DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO NYID
STONG PA NYID KYI BAR GYI PHYIR YOD PA MA YIN NO,,

SANGS RGYAS KYI CHOS MA 'DRES PA BCO BRGYAD KYI BAR DU NANG STONG
PA NYID DANG, DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO NYID STONG PA NYID KYI BAR
GYI PHYIR YOD PA MA YIN NO ZHES BYA BA NI DE NYID KYI RTOG PA
GNYIS PA GZUGS LA SOGS PA'I PHUNG PO LA RTOG PA YIN NO, ,DE LA
BYIS PA SO SO'I SKYE BO RNAMS NI MA RIG PA DANG,

SRED PA LA MNGON PAR ZHEN TO, ,DE DAG GIS NI MA RIG PA DANG, SRED
PAS BRTAGS SO, ,BRTAGS NAS MA RIG PA DANG, SRED PA DAG GIS MNGON
PAR ZHEN TE, MTHA' GNYIS SU CHAGS PAS DE DAG GIS MTHA' GNYIS YANG
DAG PA JI LTA BA BZHIN MI SHES MI MTHONG NGO, ,DE DAG GIS JI LTA
BA BZHIN MED PA'I

CHOS DE DAG BRTAGS NAS MING DANG GZUGS LA MNGON PAR ZHEN PA NAS,
SANGS RGYAS KYI CHOS RNAMS KYI BAR LA MNGON PAR ZHEN PAR GYUR TO
ZHES BYA BA NI DE NYID KYI RTOG PA GSUM PA MING DANG GZUGS LA
MNGON PAR ZHEN PA'I RTOG PA YIN NO, ,CHOS RNAMS LA MNGON PAR ZHEN
PA DE DAG NI MED PA'I MTHA' GNYIS

DAG TU RTOG PAR BYED, BRTAGS NAS MI SHES MI MTHONG NGO, ,CI ZHIG
MI SHES MI MTHONG ZHE NA, GZUGS MI SHES MI MTHONG NGO, ,TSOR BA
DANG, 'DU SHES DANG, 'DU BYED RNAMS DANG, RNAM PAR SHES PA MI
SHES MI MTHONG BA NAS, SKYE MCHED DANG, KHAMS DANG, RTEN CING
'BREL BAR 'BYUNG

BA'I BAR DU MI SHES MI MTHONG NGO, ,BYANG CHUB KYI PHYOGS KYI
CHOS SUM CU RTZA BDUN MI SHES MI MTHONG BA NAS, SANGS RGYAS KYI
CHOS MA 'DRES PA RNAMS KYI BAR DU MI SHES MI MTHONG STE, DE LTAR
DE DAG NI BYIS PA ZHES BYA BA'I GRANGS SU 'GRO'O ZHES BYA BA NI
DE NYID KYI RTOG PA BZHI PA MTHA' GNYIS LA CHAGS

@158A *, ,PA'I RNAM PAR RTOG PA YIN NO, ,DE DAG NI MA RIG PA
DANG, SRED PA'I RKYEN GYIS MI SHES MI MTHONG NGO, ,CI ZHIG MI
SHES MI MTHONG ZHE NA, GZUGS KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA'O ZHES MI SHES
MI MTHONG NGO, ,DE BZHIN DU GZUGS RNAM PAR BYANG BA'O ZHES MI
SHES MI MTHONG NGO, ,

TSOR BA DANG, 'DU SHES DANG, 'DU BYED RNAMS DANG, RNAM PAR SHES
PA KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA'O ZHES MI SHES MI MTHONG NGO, ,DE BZHIN
DU RNAM PAR SHES PA RNAM PAR BYANG BA'O ZHES MI SHES MI MTHONG
NGO, ,DE DAG NI NGES PAR MI 'BYUNG BAR MI 'GYUR RO, ,GANG NAS
NGES PAR MI 'BYUNG ZHE NA,

'DOD PA'I KHAMS NAS NGES PAR 'BYUNG BAR MI 'GYUR RO, ,GZUGS KYI
KHAMS NAS NGES PAR 'BYUNG BAR MI 'GYUR RO, ,GZUGS MED PA'I KHAMS
NAS NGES PAR 'BYUNG BAR MI 'GYUR RO, ,NYAN THOS DANG, RANG SANGS
RGYAS KYI CHOS DAG LAS NGES PAR 'BYUNG BAR MI 'GYUR RO ZHES BYA
BA NI DE NYID

KYI RTOG PA LNGA PA KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA DANG, RNAM PAR BYANG BA
MI SHES PA'I RNAM PAR RTOG PA YIN NO, ,DE DAG NI MI DAD DO, ,JI
LTAR MI DAD CE NA, GZUGS GZUGS KYIS STONG ZHES BYA BAR MI DAD DO,
,BYANG CHUB KYI BAR DU BYANG CHUB KYIS STONG ZHES BYA BAR MI DAD
DO, ,DE DAG NI GNAS PA MA

YIN NO, ,JI LTAR GNAS PA MA YIN ZHE NA, SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA LA GNAS PA MA YIN, TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA
DANG, BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, BRTZON 'GRUS KYI PHA
ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, BSAM GTAN GYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA GNAS
PA MA YIN, SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA

LA GNAS PA MA YIN, PHYIR MI LDOG PA'I SA LA GNAS PA MA YIN, SANGS
RGYAS KYI CHOS MA 'DRES PA RNAMS KYI BAR LA GNAS PA MA YIN NO,
,DE DAG NI MNGON PAR ZHEN PA YIN NO, ,JI LTAR MNGON PAR ZHEN PA
YIN ZHE NA, GZUGS LA MNGON PAR ZHEN PA YIN, TSOR BA DANG, 'DU
SHES DANG, 'DU BYED

RNAMS DANG, RNAM PAR SHES PA LA MNGON PAR ZHEN PA YIN, MIG LA
MNGON PAR ZHEN PA YIN, RNA BA DANG, SNA DANG, LCE DANG, LUS DANG,
YID LA MNGON PAR ZHEN PA YIN NO, ,SKYE MCHED DANG, KHAMS DANG,

'DAS DE LTAR SLOB PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO

PAR BYED, MNGON PAR ZHEN PAR BYED, BSAM GTAN GYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN

@159B BRGYAD PA BDAG LA SOGS PAR RTOG PA YIN NO, ,SH'A RI'I BU
RNAM PAR DAG PA NI SKYE BA MED PA MA BYUNG BA MNGON PAR 'DU BYED

DAG PA SKYE BA LA SOGS PA'I RNAM PAR RTOG PA YIN NO, ,'DI DAG NI
GZUNG BA'I RTOG PA DANG PO YIN NO, ,DE THABS MI MKHAS

BAR LA RTOG CING MNGON PAR ZHEN PA YIN NO ZHES BYA BA NI RTZE MOR
GTOGS PA'I RNAM PAR RTOG PA DANG LDAN PA DANG PO PHUNG PO'I DON
LA RNAM PAR RTOG PA YIN NO, ,MIG LA RTOG CING MNGON PAR ZHEN PA
YIN, DE BZHIN DU YID KYI BAR DANG GZUGS

LA MNGON PAR RTOG CING MNGON PAR ZHEN PA YIN, DE BZHIN DU CHOS
KYI BAR LA RTOG CING MNGON PAR ZHEN PA YIN ZHES BYA BA NI DE NYID
KYI RTOG PA GNYIS PA SKYE BA'I SGO'I DON GYI RNAM PAR RTOG PA YIN
NO, ,MIG DANG GZUGS DANG, MIG GI RNAM PAR SHES PA'I KHAMS SU RTOG
CING MNGON PAR ZHEN PA YIN, DE BZHIN DU

YID DANG CHOS DANG YID KYI RNAM PAR SHES PA'I KHAMS KYI BAR LA
RTOG CING MNGON PAR ZHEN PA YIN ZHES BYA BA NI DE NYID KYI RTOG
PA GSUM PA RIGS KYI DON LA RNAM PAR RTOG PA YIN NO, ,MA RIG PAR
RTOG CING MNGON PAR ZHEN PA YIN, DE BZHIN DU RGA SHIR RTOG CING
MNGON PAR ZHEN PA YIN ZHES BYA BA'I BAR DU'O ZHES

BYA BA NI DE NYID KYI RTOG PA BZHI PA SKYE BA'I DON LA RNAM PAR
RTOG PA YIN NO, ,DE NANG STONG PA NYID DANG, PHYI STONG PA NYID
DANG, PHYI NANG STONG PA NYID DANG, DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO NYID

PAR RTOG PA YIN

NO, ,PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DRUG LA RTOG CING MNGON PAR ZHEN PA YIN
ZHES BYA BA NI DE NYID KYI RTOG PA DRUG PA PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I
DON LA RNAM PAR RTOG PA YIN NO, ,BYANG CHUB KYI PHYOGS KYI CHOS

NO, ,SH'A RI'I BU BDAG

NYE BAR MI DMIGS, DE BZHIN DU SEMS CAN DANG, SROG DANG, GSO BA

PA'I PHYIR RO ZHES BYA BA NI DE

CES GSOL TO, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS LA LA ZHIG 'DI SKAD DU 'DRI ZHING CI
SGYU MA'I SKYES BU 'DI SHES RAB

SNYAM DU

@161B TSOR BA DANG, YID KYI 'DUS TE REG PA'I RKYEN GYIS TSOR BA
YANG GZHAN LA SGYU MA YANG GZHAN ZHIG YIN SNYAM MAM, GSOL PA,
BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE NI MA LAGS SO, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS BKA' STZAL
PA, RAB 'BYOR DE JI SNYAM DU SEMS, SA'I KHAMS KYANG GZHAN LA SGYU
MA YANG GZHAN

ZHIG YIN SNYAM MAM, RAB 'BYOR GYIS GSOL PA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS SA'I
KHAMS KYANG GZHAN MA LAGS, SGYU MA YANG GZHAN MA LAGS TE, SA'I
KHAMS NYID KYANG SGYU MA, SGYU MA NYID KYANG SA'I KHAMS SO, ,BCOM
LDAN 'DAS CHU'I KHAMS KYANG GZHAN MA LAGS, SGYU MA YANG GZHAN MA

LAGS TE, CHU'I KHAMS NYID KYANG SGYU MA, SGYU MA NYID KYANG CHU'I

'GYUR RO,, ,,BAM PO BCU GNYIS PA, RAB 'BYOR GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN

PA LA SPYOD PA'I TSE, RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN
PA'I YID LA BYA BAS RNAM PA 'DI LTAR RAB TU RTOG STE, GZUGS KYI
STONG PA NYID KYIS GZUGS STONG PA MA YIN GYI, GZUGS NYID STONG PA
NYID DO, ,STONG PA NYID NYID GZUGS SO, ,TSOR BA'I STONG PA NYID
KYIS TSOR BA STONG PA

GYI, 'DU SHES NYID STONG PA NYID, STONG PA NYID NYID 'DU SHES SO,
,'DU BYED RNAMS KYI STONG PA NYID KYIS 'DU BYED RNAMS STONG PA MA
YIN GYI, 'DU BYED RNAMS NYID STONG PA NYID,

BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'

SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DE LTAR SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA
SPYOD PA NI, SKRAG PAR MI 'GYUR, KUN TU SKRAG PAR MI 'GYUR, KUN
TU SKRAG PA DANG LDAN PAR MI 'GYUR RO ZHES BYA BA NI YONGS SU
'DZIN PA DANG PO THABS LA MKHAS PAS YONGS SU ZIN PA YIN NO, ,RAB
'BYOR GYIS GSOL PA,

BCOM LDAN 'DAS GANG DAG GIS YONGS SU BZUNG BAS SHES RAB KYI PHA
ROL TU PHYIN PA 'DI BSTAN PA THOS NAS MI DNGANG, KUN TU MI SKRAG
,KUN TU SKRAG PA DANG LDAN PAR MI 'GYUR BA BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN GANG LAGS, BCOM LDAN
'DAS

KYIS BKA' STZAL PA, RAB 'BYOR 'DI LA BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS
DPA' CHEN PO'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN NI GANG DE LA GZUGS MI RTAG
CES BYA BAR DE MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS CHOS STON CING, DGE BA'I
RTZA BA DE DAG THAMS CAD KYANG RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID
MA GTOGS

@168A *, ,PAR NYAN THOS KYI SA'AM, RANG SANGS RGYAS KYI SAR YONGS
SU BSDOR MI 'JUG PA DANG, TSOR BA DANG, 'DU SHES DANG, 'DU BYED
RNAMS DANG, RNAM PAR SHES PA MI RTAG CES BYA BAR DE MI DMIGS PA'I
TSUL GYIS CHOS STON CING, DGE BA'I RTZA BA DE DAG THAMS

CAD KYANG RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID MA GTOGS PAR NYAN THOS

STE, RAB 'BYOR 'DI NI BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I
DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DU RIG PAR BYA'O, ,RAB 'BYOR GZHAN YANG
BYANG CHUB

SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN NI, GANG DE LA
GZUGS SDUG BSNGAL ZHES BYA BAR DE MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS CHOS

GANG DE LA

@170A *, ,CAD MKHYEN PA NYID MA GTOGS PAR NYAN THOS KYI SA'AM,
RANG SANGS RGYAS KYI SAR YONGS SU BSDOR MI 'JUG PA'O, ,RAB 'BYOR
'DI NI BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I DGE BA'I BSHES
GNYEN DU RIG PAR BYA STE, DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DES

YONGS SU ZIN PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO NI SHES
RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA 'DI BSTAN PA THOS NAS, MI DNGANG, KUN
TU MI SKRAG ,KUN TU SKRAG PA DANG LDAN PAR MI 'GYUR RO, ,RAB
'BYOR GYIS GSOL PA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA'

CHEN PO SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA SKYOD PA'I TSE, GANG
GIS SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA BSTAN PA 'DI THOS NAS DNGANG
ZHING KUN TU SKRAG LA KUN TU SKRAG PA DANG LDAN PAR 'GYUR BA
THABS MI MKHAS PAR 'GYUR BA DANG, SDIG PA'I GROGS PO'I LAG TU
SONG BAR 'GYUR BA JI LTA BU ZHIG LAGS,

BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS BKA' STZAL PA, RAB 'BYOR 'DI LA BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA
SPYOD PA'I TSE, RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN PA'I
YID LA BYED PA DANG BRAL BAS SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA
SGOM ZHING DMIGS TE,

SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DES KYANG RLOM SEMS SU BYED PA
DANG, RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I YID LA BYED PA DANG BRAL BAS
BSAM GTAN GYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA SGOM ZHING DMIGS TE, BSAM GTAN
GYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DES KYANG RLOM SEMS SU BYED PA DANG, RNAM
PA THAMS CAD

MKHYEN PA'I YID LA BYED PA DANG BRAL BAS BRTZON 'GRUS KYI PHA ROL
TU PHYIN PA SGOM ZHING DMIGS TE, BRTZON 'GRUS KYI PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA DES KYANG RLOM SEMS SU BYED PA DANG, RNAM PA THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA'I YID LA BYED PA DANG BRAL BAS BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA SGOM ZHING DMIGS TE,

BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DES KYANG RLOM SEMS SU BYED PA
DANG, RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I YID LA BYED PA DANG BRAL BAS
TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA SGOM ZHING DMIGS TE, TSUL
KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DES KYANG RLOM SEMS SU BYED PA
DANG, RNAM PA THAMS CAD

@170B MKHYEN PA'I YID LA BYED PA DANG BRAL BAS SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL
TU PHYIN PA SGOM ZHING DMIGS TE, SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA
DES KYANG RLOM SEMS SU BYED PA DE LTA BU NI, RAB 'BYOR BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA

DU BYAR

MI DMIGS SO, ,RAB 'BYOR 'DI LTA STE DPER NA, SHIN TU DBEN PA'I
PHYIR, SKYE MCHED DANG,

ROL TU PHYIN PA LA SPYOD PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I TSIG GI DON
MED CING

MI DMIGS SO, ,RAB 'BYOR 'DI LTA STE DPER NA, DRAN PA NYE BAR
GZHAG PA SHIN TU RNAM PAR DAG PA LA GNAS MED CING MI DMIGS SO,

DON MED CING

GYI RKANG PA DANG, DBANG PO DANG, STOBS DANG, BYANG CHUB KYI YAN

PA'I BDEN PA DANG, BSAM GTAN DANG, TSAD MED PA DANG,

GZHAN YANG KHAMS GSUM PAR MA GTOGS PA'I CHOS GANG CUNG ZAD YOD PA
RNAMS DANG, BYANG CHUB KYI PHYOGS KYI CHOS SUM CU RTZA BDUN DANG,
SANGS RGYAS KYI CHOS MA 'DRES PA BCO BRGYAD KYI BAR DAG STE, DE
DAG NI 'DUS BYAS KYI CHOS ZHES BYA'O, ,GSOL PA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS
'DUS MA BYAS KYI CHOS

MA

YIN PA DE BZHIN NYID, CHOS NYID, CHOS KYI DBYINGS, CHOS GNAS PA

LAGS,

RNAM PAR SHES PA YANG CHAGS PA MED PA'O, ,SKYE MCHED DANG, KHAMS
DANG, RTEN

ZAG PA MED CING KHONGS SUM

DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA SPYOD
PA'I BSAM GTAN GYI PHA

ROL TU PHYIN PA'O, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU GZHAN YANG
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO NYAN THOS DANG, RANG SANGS
RGYAS DANG LDAN PA'I YID LA BYA BAS MA YIN GYI, RNAM PA THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN PA'I YID LA BYA BAS BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA LA SPYOD CING CHOS

THAMS CAD SGYU MAR BYAS PA'I 'DU SHES NYE BAR GNAS TE, BZOD PA
DES RLOM SEMS SU MI BYED CING, BZOD PA MI DMIGS PA 'DI NI BYANG
CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA
SPYOD PA'I SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'O, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA
SH'A RI'I BU

@193A *, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO BZOD PA'I PHA
ROL TU PHYIN PA LA DE LTAR SPYOD PA NI, PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DRUG
PO THAMS CAD YONGS SU 'DZIN TE, DE'I PHYIR GO CHA CHEN PO BGOS
ZHES BYA'O ZHES BYA BA NI BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DRUG PA'I
GO CHA STE

GSUM PA'O, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO BRTZON 'GRUS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA
LA SPYOD CING, NYAN THOS DANG, RANG SANGS RGYAS DANG LDAN PA'I
YID LA BYA BAS MA YIN GYI, RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG
LDAN PA'I YID LA BYA BAS

SBYIN PA YONGS SU GTONG ZHING, DGE BA'I RTZA BA DE YANG SEMS CAN
THAMS CAD DANG THUN MONG DU BYAS TE, BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR
RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB TU YONGS SU BSNGO BA 'DI NI, BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO BRTZON 'GRUS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA
LA SPYOD CING SBYIN PA'I

PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'O, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU GZHAN YANG
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO BRTZON 'GRUS KYI PHA ROL
TU PHYIN PA LA SPYOD CING, NYAN THOS DANG, RANG SANGS RGYAS DANG
LDAN PA'I YID LA BYA BAS MA YIN GYI, RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA
NYID DANG LDAN PA'I YID LA

PAR RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB TU YONGS SU BSNGO BA 'DI NI BYANG CHUB

LA SPYOD PA'I TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL

,TSE DANG LDAN PA

DE DAG GI DBANG GIS SKYE BA YANG MA YIN, DE BZHIN DU TSAD MED PA
DANG,

GZUGS MED PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PAR BYED KYANG DE DAG GI RO MYONG
BAR MI BYED, DE DAG GIS 'PHROG PAR YANG MI 'GYUR, DE DAG GI DBANG
GIS SKYE BA YANG MA YIN PA 'DI NI, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA'
CHEN PO'I THABS MKHAS PA DANG LDAN PA'I SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU

BRJOD PA CHED DU BRJOD CING, MING YONGS SU SGROGS PAR MDZAD DE,
'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS

CHE GE MO ZHIG NA, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO GO CHA
CHEN PO BGOS PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED
DO, ,SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING YONGS SU DAG PAR BYED DO, ,RDZU 'PHRUL
GYIS RNAM PAR RTZE'O ZHES SGRA BRJOD PA MDZAD CING DBYANGS RJES
SU SGROG GO ZHES BYA BA NI DRUG

@196B PA'I GO CHA'I MJUG BSDU BA'O, ,GO CHA'I SGRUB PA BSTAN ZIN
TO,, ,,SH'A RI'I BUS SMRAS PA, TSE DANG LDAN PA GANG PO CI TZAM
GYIS NA, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO THEG PA CHEN PO
LA YANG DAG PAR 'JUG PA DANG, THEG PA CHEN PO LA 'DZEG PAR 'GYUR
BA YIN, GANG

POS SMRAS PA, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU 'DI LA BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA
SPYOD CING 'DOD PAS DBEN PA SDIG TO MI DGE BA'I CHOS KYIS DBEN PA
RTOG PA DANG BCAS DPYOD PA DANG BCAS PA, DBEN PA LAS SKYES PA'I
DGA' BA DANG, BDE BA

CAN BSAM GTAN DANG PO LA NYE BAR BSGRUBS TE GNAS SO, ,DE BZHIN DU
BSAM GTAN GNYIS PA DANG, GSUM PA DANG, BZHI PA LA NYE BAR BSGRUBS
TE GNAS SO, ,DE BZHIN DU NAM MKHA' MTHA' YAS SKYE MCHED DANG,
RNAM SHES MTHA' YAS SKYE MCHED DANG, CI YANG MED PA'I SKYE MCHED

DANG, 'DU SHES MED 'DU SHES MED MIN SKYE MCHED LA SNYOMS PAR 'JUG
PA STE, 'DI DAG NI BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I BSAM
GTAN DANG GZUGS MED PA'O, ,GANG GI TSE BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS
DPA' CHEN PO BSAM GTAN DANG, GZUGS MED PA'I SNYOMS

PAR 'JUG PA 'DI DAG GIS SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA SPYAD
PA NA, NAM MKHA'I RNAM PA DANG, RTAGS DANG, MTSAN MAS MNYAM PAR
'JOG CING LDANG BA NA DGE BA'I RTZA BA DE YANG BLA NA MED PA YANG
DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB TU YONGS SU SNGO BAR BYED PA 'DI
NI, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS

DPA' CHEN PO'I SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'O, ,DE BZHIN DU
TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA DANG, BRTZON 'GRUS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, BSAM
GTAN GYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA YANG BRJOD PAR BYA'O, ,SH'A RI'I
BU GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'

SEMS DPA' CHEN PO SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA SPYOD PA
NI, BSAM GTAN BZHI LA SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PAR BYED, GZUGS MED PA'I
SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA BZHI LA YANG SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PAR BYED, GANG GI
TSE BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO BSAM GTAN 'DI DAG
DANG,

@197A *, ,GZUGS MED PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA 'DI DAG GIS GNAS
SHING, DE BSAM GTAN DANG, GZUGS MED PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA 'DI
DAG LA SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA DANG LDAN PA NA, NAM MKHA'I RNAM PA
DANG, RTAGS DANG, MTSAN MA YID LA BYED PAS

SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA SPYOD CING DGE BA'I RTZA BA
DE DANG GZHAN YANG RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN
PA'I YID LA BYED PAS, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD DANG THUN MONG DU BYAS
NAS BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB TU YONGS SU
SNGO BAR BYED PA 'DI NI, BYANG CHUB

SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'O,
,SH'A RI'I BU DE BZHIN DU BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO
PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DRUG LA SPYOD PA NI, THEG PA CHEN PO LA RAB
TU ZHUGS PA YIN NO, ,SEMS CAN RNAMS KYANG YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED
DO, ,SANGS

RGYAS KYI ZHING YANG YONGS SU DAG PAR BYED DO ZHES BYA BA NI BSAM
GTAN DANG, GZUGS MED PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA LA SNYOMS PAR 'JUG
PA DANG LDAN PA'I 'JUG PA YIN NO, ,SH'A RI'I BU GZHAN YANG BYANG
CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DE RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA
NYID DANG LDAN PA'I

YID LA BYED PAS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI NYON MONGS PA RAB TU SPANG
PA'I PHYIR CHOS BSTAN PAR BYA'O SNYAM PA 'DI NI, BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'O, ,NAM
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN
PA NYID DANG LDAN

PA'I YID LA BYA BA DE DAG GIS BSAM GTAN DANG, TSAD MED PA DANG,
GZUGS MED PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA DE DAG LA SNYOMS PAR GZHOG CING
RNAM PAR LDANG BA YANG 'DI LTA STE, NYAN THOS SAM, RANG SANGS
RGYAS KYI SEMS SAM, SEMS BSKYED PA GZHAN GYI GO MI 'BYED PA 'DI
NI

BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA MCHOG TU 'DZIN PA MED PA'O, ,NAM BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN PA'I
YID LA BYA BAS BSAM GTAN DANG, TSAD MED PA DANG, GZUGS MED PA'I

@197B SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA DE DAG GIS GNAS PA NA 'DI SNYAM STE,
SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI NYON MONGS PA ZAD PAR BYA BA'I PHYIR CHOS
STON TO SNYAM DU SEMS SHING YID LA BYED PA DE DAG LA 'DOD PA
DANG, BZOD PA DANG, NYE BAR RTOG PA DANG, RTOGS PA DANG, NGES PAR
SEMS PAR BYED PA 'DI NI,

BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA'O, ,NAM BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DE RNAM
PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN PA'I YID LA BYA BAS BSAM
GTAN DANG, TSAD MED PA DANG, GZUGS MED PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA DE
DAG GIS

RNAM PAR SPYOD PA'I TSE, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI DON DANG, PHAN PA
DANG, RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID KYI PHYIR, BRTZON 'GRUS MI
GTONG PA 'DI NI, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I BRTZON
'GRUS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'O, ,NAM BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS

DPA' CHEN PO RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN PA'I YID
LA BYA BAS BSAM GTAN DANG, GZUGS MED PA LA SNYOMS PAR 'JUG KYANG,
MI DMIGS PA 'DI NI BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I BSAM
GTAN GYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'O, ,NAM BYANG CHUB SEMS

DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN
PA'I YID LA BYA BAS BSAM GTAN DANG PO'I YAN LAG DANG, BSAM GTAN
GNYIS PA DANG, GSUM PA DANG, BZHI PA'I YAN LAG RNAMS LA MI RTAG
PA'I RNAM PA DANG, SDUG BSNGAL BA'I RNAM PA DANG, BDAG MED

PA'I RNAM PA DANG, ZHI BA'I RNAM PA DANG, STONG PA'I RNAM PA
DANG, MTSAN MA MED PA'I RNAM PA DANG, SMON PA MED PA'I RNAM PAR
RAB TU RTOGS KYANG, BSAM GTAN DANG, TSAD MED PA DANG, GZUGS MED
PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA DE DAG MI DMIGS SHING DE DAG GIS RLOM
SEMS

SU MI BYED PA 'DI NI, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I
SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA STE, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I
BU 'DI NI, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA DRUG LA SPYOD PA'I THEG PA CHEN PO'O ZHES BYA BA NI PHA
ROL TU PHYIN PA DRUG GI 'JUG

@198A *, ,PA YIN NO, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU GZHAN YANG,
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO THEG PA CHEN PO NI RNAM PA
THAMS CAD DU BYANG CHUB KYI PHYOGS KYI CHOS SUM CU RTZA BDUN SGOM
PA DANG, RNAM PA THAMS CAD DU RNAM PAR THAR PA'I SGO STONG PA
NYID DANG, MTSAN

MA MED PA DANG, SMON PA MED PA SGOM PA DANG, RNAM PA THAMS CAD DU
DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I STOBS BCU DANG, MI 'JIGS PA BZHI DANG, SO SO
YANG DAG PAR RIG PA BZHI DANG, SANGS RGYAS KYI CHOS MA 'DRES PA
RNAMS SGOM PAR BYED PA 'DI NI, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'

SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I THEG PA CHEN PO'O ZHES BYA BA NI 'PHAGS PA'I
LAM LA 'JUG PA'O, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU GZHAN YANG BYANG
CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DE BYAMS PA DANG LDAN PA'I SEMS
YANGS PA, RGYA CHEN POR GYUR PA, MI GNYIS PA, TSAD MED PA,

KHO NA MED PA, 'GRAN ZLA MED PA, SGRIB PA MED PA, GNOD PA MED PA,
THAMS CAD DU SONG BA SHIN TU BSGOMS PAS PHYOGS GCIG GI 'JIG RTEN
CHOS KYI DBYINGS KYIS KLAS PA, NAM MKHA'I MTHAS GTUGS PA THAMS
CAD DANG LDAN PA'I 'JIG RTEN KHYAB PAR BYAS SHING, NYE BAR

BSGRUBS NAS GNAS PA NAS, PHYOGS BCU'I 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS KYI BAR
DU KHYAB PAR BYAS SHING NYE BAR BSGRUBS NAS GNAS SO, ,DE SNYING
RJE DANG LDAN PA DANG, DGA' BA DANG LDAN PA DANG, BTANG SNYOMS
DANG LDAN PA'I SEMS YANGS PA, RGYA CHEN POR GYUR PA, MI GNYIS PA,
TSAD MED

PA, KHO NA MED PA, 'GRAN ZLA MED PA, SGRIB PA MED PA, GNOD PA MED
PA, THAMS CAD DU SONG BA SHIN TU BSGOMS PAS PHYOGS GCIG GI 'JIG
RTEN CHOS KYI DBYINGS KYIS KLAS PA, NAM MKHA'I MTHAS GTUGS PA
THAMS CAD DANG LDAN PA'I 'JIG RTEN KHYAB PAR BYAS SHING, NYE BAR

BSGRUBS NAS GNAS PA NAS, PHYOGS BCU'I 'JIG RTEN GYI BAR DU KHYAB
PAR BYAS SHING NYE BAR BSGRUBS NAS GNAS SO, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA
SH'A RI'I BU GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO
BYAMS PA'I TING NGE 'DZIN LA MNYAM PAR 'JOG CING BDAG GIS SEMS
CAN THAMS

@198B CAD YONGS SU BSKYAB PAR BYA'O ZHES DE LA GZHOL BAR BYED,
SNYING RJE'I TING NGE 'DZIN LA MNYAM PA 'JOG CING, SEMS CAN RNAMS
LA SNYING RJE BA DANG, SNYING BRTZE BA LA GZHOL BAR BYED, DGA'
BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN LA MNYAM PAR 'JOG CING, BDAG NYID KYIS SEMS
CAN DGA' BAR BYA'O ZHES

SEMS CAN RNAMS LA GZHOL BAR BYED, BTANG SNYOMS KYI TING NGE 'DZIN
LA MNYAM PAR 'JOG CING, SEMS CAN RNAMS ZAG PA ZAD PA LA RAB TU
GZHOL BAR BYED DE, 'DI NI BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO
TSAD MED PA RNAMS LA SPYOD PA'I SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN
PA'O,,

NAM BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO BSAM GTAN DANG, TSAD
MED PA RNAMS KYI RNAM PA DANG, RTAGS DANG MTSAN MA LA MNYAM PAR
GZHOG CING, RNAM PAR LDANG YANG RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID
DU BSNGO BA MA GTOGS PAR NYAN THOS DANG, RANG SANGS RGYAS KYI SAR
YONGS

SU MI BSNGO BA 'DI NI, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO
TSAD MED PA RNAMS LA SPYOD PA'I TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN
PA MCHOG TU 'DZIN PA MED PA'O, ,NAM BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS
DPA' CHEN PO BSAM GTAN DANG, TSAD MED PA DANG, GZUGS MED PA'I
SNYOMS PAR

'JUG PA DE DAG GIS MA 'DRES PAR RNAM PAR SPYOD CING, SA GNYIS PO
NYAN THOS KYI SA'AM, RANG SANGS RGYAS KYI SAR 'DOD PA MI BSKYED
KYI, RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DU BZOD PA DANG, 'DOD PA
'DI NI BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO TSAD MED PA RNAMS
LA SPYOD PA'I

BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'O, ,NAM BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS
DPA' CHEN PO RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN PA'I SEMS
BSKYED PAS MI DGE BA'I CHOS RNAMS RAB TU SPANG BA DANG, DGE BA'I
CHOS PHUN SUM TSOGS PAR BYA BA'I DON DU BRTZON 'GRUS MI GTONG BAS
RNAM PAR SPYOD PA 'DI

SPYOD PA'I BRTZON 'GRUS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'O, ,NAM BYANG
CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO BSAM GTAN DANG, TSAD MED PA
DANG, GZUGS MED PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA DE DAG LA YANG MNYAM PAR
'JOG LA,

@199A *, ,BSAM GTAN DANG, TSAD MED PA DANG, GZUGS MED PA'I SNYOMS
PAR 'JUG PA'I DBANG GIS KYANG MI SKYE ZHING, DE DAG GI RO MYONG
BAR BYED PA YANG MED LA, DE DAG GIS 'PHROGS PAR YANG MI 'GYUR BA
'DI NI, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO TSAD MED

PA RNAMS LA SPYOD PA'I BSAM GTAN GYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'O, ,NAM
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN
PA NYID DANG LDAN PA'I YID LA BYA BAS BSAM GTAN DANG, TSAD MED PA
DANG, GZUGS MED PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA DE DAG LA YANG MNYAM PAR
'JOG

CING, RNAM PAR LDANG BA LA, DE DAG LA MI RTAG PA'I RNAM PA DANG,
SDUG BSNGAL BA'I RNAM PA DANG, BDAG MED PA'I RNAM PA DANG, ZHI
BA'I RNAM PA DANG, STONG PA'I RNAM PA DANG, MTSAN MA MED PA'I

THOS DANG, RANG SANGS RGYAS

BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I THEG PA CHEN PO'O ZHES
BYA BA NI TSAD MED PA LA 'JUG

PA'O, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I THEG PA CHEN PO NI, GANG NANG STONG PA
NYID SHES KYANG DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS MA YIN, PHYI STONG PA NYID
SHES KYANG DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS MA YIN PA DANG, PHYI NANG STONG
PA NYID DANG, DNGOS PO MED

BU 'DI NI BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I THEG PA CHEN
PO'O, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I THEG PA

@199B DPA' CHEN PO'I THEG PA CHEN PO NI RTAG CES BYA BAR SHES PA
MI 'JUG ,MI RTAG PA DANG, BDE BA DANG, SDUG BSNGAL BA DANG, BDAG

STONG PA DANG, MI STONG PA DANG, MTSAN MA YOD PA DANG, MTSAN MA
MED PA DANG, SMON

PA YOD PA DANG, SMON PA MED CES BYA BAR SHES PA MI 'JUG PA STE,
TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU 'DI NI BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS
DPA' CHEN PO'I THEG PA CHEN PO'O, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU
GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I THEG PA CHEN
PO NI GANG 'DAS PA'I

GYIS SHES PA MI 'JUG PA 'DI NI, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I THEG PA CHEN PO'O, ,

PAR MI BYED DE, 'DOD PA DANG, GZUGS DANG, GZUGS MED PA'I KHAMS

LAS 'DAS PA'I CHOS

DANG,

@200A *, ,DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO THEG PA CHEN PO LA ZHUGS PA ZHES

PHYIN PA LA SPYOD PA'I TSE, SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA
'DZEG KYANG, DES

SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA MI DMIGS TE, SBYIN PA PO DANG, LEN
PA PO DANG, SBYIN PA RNAMS MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS DMIGS SU MED
PA DE LTA NA TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
SEMS DPA' CHEN PO THEG PA CHEN PO LA 'DZEG PA ZHES BYA'O, ,DE
BZHIN DU SHES RAB KYI PHA

PHYIN PA DANG, BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, BRTZON 'GRUS

PO LA

'JUG PA'O, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB

DON DU, BYANG CHUB

PAR BYED DE, SH'A RI'I BU DE LTAR NA BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS

THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID

SH'A RI'I BU

SO, ,GZUGS DMIGS SU MED PA'I PHYIR 'DI NI THA SNYAD TZAM STE, 'DI
LTA STE,

GZUGS ZHES BYA BAR SHES SO, ,TSOR BA DANG, 'DU SHES DANG, 'DU
BYED RNAMS DANG, RNAM PAR SHES PA DMIGS SU MED PA'I PHYIR 'DI NI
THA SNYAD TZAM STE, 'DI LTA STE, RNAM PAR SHES PA ZHES BYA'O ZHES

,SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DMIGS SU MED PA'I PHYIR 'DI NI
THA SNYAD TZAM STE, 'DI LTA STE, SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA
ZHES BYA BAR DE LTAR SHES SO, ,

TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA DANG, BRTZON 'GRUS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, BSAM
GTAN GYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN
PA DMIGS SU MED PA'I PHYIR 'DI NI THA SNYAD TZAM STE, 'DI LTA
STE, SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA

SU MED PA'I PHYIR 'DI NI THA SNYAD TZAM STE, 'DI LTA STE, BYANG

GSHEGS PA'I STOBS RNAMS DANG, MI 'JIGS PA BZHI DANG, SO SO YANG
DAG

@201A *, ,PAR RIG PA BZHI DANG, SANGS RGYAS KYI CHOS MA 'DRES PA
RNAMS DMIGS SU MED PA'I PHYIR 'DI NI THA SNYAD TZAM STE, 'DI LTA
STE, SANGS RGYAS KYI CHOS MA 'DRES PA BCO BRGYAD CES BYA BAR SHES
SO, ,NANG STONG PA NYID DMIGS SU MED PA'I PHYIR 'DI NI THA SNYAD
TZAM STE,

'DI LTA STE, NANG STONG PA NYID CES BYA BAR SHES SO, ,PHYI STONG
PA NYID DMIGS SU MED PA'I PHYIR 'DI NI THA SNYAD TZAM STE, 'DI
LTA STE, PHYI STONG PA NYID CES BYA BAR SHES SO, ,PHYI NANG STONG
PA NYID DMIGS SU MED PA'I PHYIR 'DI NI THA SNYAD TZAM STE, 'DI
LTA STE, PHYI NANG STONG PA NYID CES BYA BAR

,DE BZHIN NYID DMIGS SU MED PA'I PHYIR 'DI NI THA SNYAD TZAM STE,
'DI LTA STE, DE BZHIN NYID CES BYA BAR

NYID DANG, CHOS NYID DANG, CHOS KYI DBYINGS DANG, CHOS KYI GNAS
NYID DANG, CHOS NGES PA NYID DANG, YANG DAG PA'I MTHA' DMIGS SU
MED PA'I PHYIR 'DI NI THA SNYAD TZAM STE, 'DI LTA STE, YANG DAG
PA'I MTHA'

THA SNYAD TZAM STE, 'DI LTA STE, BYANG CHUB CES BYA BAR SHES SO,

'DI LTA STE, SANGS RGYAS ZHES BYA BAR YANG DAG PAR SHES TE, TSE
DANG LDAN

PA SH'A RI'I BU DE LTAR NA, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN
PO THEG PA CHEN PO LA 'DZEG PA ZHES BYA'O ZHES BYA BA NI CHED DU
BYA BA LA 'JUG PA'O, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU GZHAN YANG
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO SEMS DANG PO BSKYED PA NAS
NYE BAR BZUNG STE, SNYING

PO BYANG CHUB LA 'DUG GI BAR DU MNGON PAR SHES PA THAMS CAD YONGS
SU RDZOGS PA'I PHYIR NA SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED DO,
,SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING DANG, SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING DU SANGS RGYAS
GANG LA MCHOD PA DANG BKUR STI GANG BYA BAR 'OS PA'I MCHOD PAS,
SANGS RGYAS

@201B BCOM LDAN 'DAS RNAMS LA BKUR STIR BYED, BLA MAR BYED, RI
MOR BYED, MCHOD PAR BYED DO, ,SANGS RGYAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE DAG

,DE BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I THEG PA DE LA 'DZEGS NAS, SANGS RGYAS
KYI ZHING NAS

SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING DU 'GRO ZHING, SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING YONGS
SU DAG PAR BYED, SEMS CAN RNAMS YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED KYANG, DE

GYI 'DU SHES KYANG MI 'BYUNG, SANGS RGYAS KYI 'DU SHES KYANG MI
'BYUNG NGO, ,DE GNYIS SU MED

PA'I SA LA GNAS SHING, LUS JI LTA BUS SEMS CAN RNAMS KYI DON BYA

'DZIN TO, ,DE RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID KYI YE SHES THOB
PAR MA GYUR GYI BAR DU THEG PA CHEN PO DE DANG NAM YANG MI 'BRAL

CHEN

,DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I STOBS BCU DANG, MI 'JIGS PA BZHI DANG, SO
SO YANG DAG PAR RIG PA BZHI DANG, SANGS RGYAS KYI CHOS MA 'DRES
PA BCO

BRGYAD NI MI BYED MI 'GYUR, MNGON PAR 'DU MI BYED DE, DE CI'I
PHYIR ZHE NA, DE SHIN TU MI DMIGS PA'I PHYIR RO, ,RAB 'BYOR DE
BZHIN NYID NI MI BYED MI 'GYUR, MNGON PAR 'DU MI BYED DE, DE CI'I
PHYIR ZHE NA, DE SHIN TU MI DMIGS PA'I PHYIR RO, ,MA NOR BA DE
BZHIN NYID DANG, GZHAN

MA YIN PA DE BZHIN NYID DANG, CHOS NYID DANG, CHOS KYI DBYINGS
DANG, CHOS KYI GNAS NYID DANG, CHOS NGES PA NYID DANG, YANG DAG
PA'I MTHA' DANG, BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA'I DBYINGS NI MI BYED MI
'GYUR, MNGON PAR 'DU MI BYED DE, DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, DE SHIN TU
MI DMIGS PA'I

PHYIR RO, ,RAB 'BYOR BYANG CHUB NI MI BYED MI 'GYUR, MNGON PAR
'DU MI BYED DE, DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, DE SHIN TU MI DMIGS PA'I
PHYIR RO, ,RAB 'BYOR RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID NI MI BYED
MI 'GYUR, MNGON PAR 'DU MI BYED DE, DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, DE SHIN
TU MI DMIGS PA'I PHYIR RO, ,RAB

'BYOR RNAM GRANGS DES NA 'DI LTAR RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA
NYID DE MA BYAS MI 'GYUR MNGON PAR 'DU MA BYAS PAR RIG PAR BYA'O,

PAR 'DUS MA BYAS PAR

'DAS KYIS BKA' STZAL PA, RAB 'BYOR 'DI LA BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN PA'I
SEMS BSKYED PAS, BDAG NYID BSAM GTAN RNAMS LA THABS MKHAS PAS

MNYAM PAR GZHOG KYANG DE DAG GI DBANG GIS MI SKYE ZHING, GZHAN
YANG BSAM GTAN RNAMS LA MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS YANG DAG PAR 'GOD
PA 'DI NI, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I BSAM GTAN GYI
PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'O, ,GSOL PA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS BYANG CHUB

SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA
GANG LAGS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS BKA' STZAL PA, RAB 'BYOR 'DI LA
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN
PA NYID DANG LDAN PA'I SEMS BSKYED PAS, BDAG KYANG CHOS THAMS CAD
LA

MNGON PAR ZHEN PAR MI BYED PA DANG, CHOS THAMS CAD KYI RANG BZHIN
LA SO SOR RTOG PAR BYED CING, SEMS CAN RNAMS KYANG CHOS THAMS CAD
LA MNGON PAR ZHEN PAR MI BYED PA DANG, ,CHOS THAMS CAD KYI RANG
BZHIN RTOGS PAR BYA BA LA MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS, YANG DAG PAR
RAB TU 'GOD PA

'DI NI BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I SHES RAB KYI PHA
ROL TU PHYIN PA STE, DE NI RAB 'BYOR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS
DPA' CHEN PO'I THEG PA CHEN PO'O ZHES BYA BA NI THABS LA MKHAS
PA'I TSOGS SO, ,RAB 'BYOR GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS
DPA' CHEN PO'I

THEG PA CHEN PO NI 'DI LTA STE, NANG STONG PA NYID DANG, PHYI
STONG PA NYID DANG, PHYI NANG STONG PA NYID DANG, STONG PA NYID
STONG PA NYID DANG, CHEN PO STONG PA NYID DANG, DON DAM PA STONG
PA NYID DANG, 'DUS BYAS STONG PA NYID DANG, 'DUS MA BYAS STONG PA
NYID DANG, MTHA' LAS 'DAS PA STONG PA NYID DANG,

@215A *, ,THOG MA DANG THA MA MED PA STONG PA NYID DANG, DOR BA
MED PA STONG PA NYID DANG, RANG BZHIN STONG PA NYID DANG, CHOS
THAMS CAD STONG PA NYID DANG, RANG GI MTSAN NYID STONG PA NYID
DANG, MI DMIGS PA STONG PA NYID DANG, DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO
NYID STONG PA NYID DANG, DNGOS PO STONG

PA NYID DANG, DNGOS PO MED PA STONG PA NYID DANG, RANG GI NGO BO
STONG PA NYID DANG, GZHAN GYI NGO BO STONG PA NYID DO, ,DE LA
NANG STONG PA NYID GANG ZHE NA, NANG GI CHOS ZHES BYA BA NI 'DI
LTA STE, MIG DANG, RNA BA DANG, SNA DANG, LCE DANG, LUS DANG, YID
LA BRJOD DO, ,DE LA THER ZUG TU GNAS PA

MED PA DANG 'JIG PA MED PA'I PHYIR MIG NI MIG GIS STONG NGO, ,DE
CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, DE'I RANG BZHIN DE YIN PA'I PHYIR RO, ,THER
ZUG TU GNAS PA MED PA DANG, 'JIG PA MED PA'I PHYIR RNA BA NI RNA
BAS STONG NGO, ,DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, DE'I RANG BZHIN DE YIN PA'I
PHYIR RO, ,SNA DANG, LCE DANG, LUS DANG,

THER ZUG TU GNAS PA MED PA DANG, 'JIG PA MED PA'I PHYIR YID NI
YID KYIS STONG NGO, ,DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, DE'I RANG BZHIN DE YIN
PA'I PHYIR RO, ,'DI NI NANG STONG PA NYID CES BYA'O, ,DE LA PHYI
STONG PA NYID GANG ZHE NA, PHYI'I CHOS ZHES BYA BA NI 'DI LTA
STE, GZUGS DANG, SGRA DANG, DRI DANG, RO DANG,

REG DANG, CHOS RNAMS LA BRJOD DO, ,DE LA THER ZUG TU GNAS PA MED
PA DANG, 'JIG PA MED PA'I PHYIR GZUGS GZUGS KYIS STONG NGO, ,DE
CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, DE'I RANG BZHIN DE YIN PA'I PHYIR RO, ,DE
BZHIN DU THER ZUG TU GNAS PA MED PA DANG, 'JIG PA MED PA'I PHYIR,
SGRA DANG, DRI DANG,

RO DANG, REG DANG, CHOS CHOS KYIS STONG NGO, ,DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE
NA, DE'I RANG BZHIN DE YIN PA'I PHYIR TE, 'DI NI PHYI STONG PA
NYID CES BYA'O, ,DE LA PHYI NANG STONG PA NYID GANG ZHE NA, PHYI
NANG GI CHOS ZHES BYA BA NI 'DI LTA STE, NANG GI SKYE MCHED DRUG
DANG, PHYI'I SKYE MCHED DRUG LA BRJOD DO, ,DE LA THER ZUG

TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, SPOBS PA MTHA' YAS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE
'DZIN DANG, MI MNYAM PA DANG MNYAM PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE
'DZIN DANG, CHOS THAMS CAD LAS 'DA' BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE
'DZIN DANG, YONGS SU GCOD PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG,
NEM NUR RNAM PAR SEL BA ZHES

BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, GNAS SU BYA BA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I
TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, GCIG TU RNAM PAR BKOD PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING
NGE 'DZIN DANG, RNAM PAR MNGON PAR SGRUB PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING
NGE 'DZIN DANG, RNAM PA GCIG TU GYUR PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE
'DZIN DANG, RNAM PAR 'DOR BA MED PA ZHES

BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, RTOGS PAS SRID PA'I GZHI THAMS CAD
KHONG DU CHUD PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, BRDA DANG
SGRA LA 'JUG PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, SGRA DBYANGS
KYI YI GE DANG BRAL BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, SGRON
MA 'BAR BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, MTSAN NYID

YONGS SU SBYONG BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, MNGON PAR
DMIGS PA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, RNAM PA'I
MCHOG THAMS CAD DANG LDAN PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG,
BDE BA DANG SDUG BSNGAL THAMS CAD LA MNGON PAR DGA' BA MED PA
ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, ZAD MI SHES

PA'I ZA MA TOG CES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, GZUNGS KYI BLO
GROS ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, YANG DAG PA DANG LOG PA
THAMS CAD YANG DAG PAR SEL BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG,
'GAL PA DANG 'GOG PA THAMS CAD YANG DAG PAR ZHI BAR BYED PA ZHES
BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, MTHUN

@219A *, ,PA DANG 'GAL BA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN
DANG, 'OD DRI MA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, SNYING
PO DANG LDAN PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, ZLA BA DRI MA
MED PAR RGYAS PA'I 'OD CES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, BKOD PA
CHEN PO ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG,

RNAM PA THAMS CAD DU 'OD BYED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN
DANG, TING NGE 'DZIN MNYAM PA NYID CES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN
DANG, RDUL MED CING RDUL DANG BRAL BA'I TSUL DANG LDAN PA ZHES
BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, NYON MONGS PA MED PAR YANG DAG PAR
GZHOL BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, NYON MONGS

PA DANG BCAS PA THAMS CAD NYON MONGS PA MED PAR YANG DAG PAR
GZHOL BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, GNAS DMIGS SU MED PA
LA BRTZON PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, DE BZHIN NYID LA
GNAS SHING SEMS MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, LUS KYI
SKYON YANG DAG PAR SEL PA ZHES

BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, NGAG GI SKYON RNAM PAR 'JIG PAS NAM
MKHA' LHAR GYUR PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN DANG, NAM MKHA'
LTAR CHAGS PA MED PAS RNAM PAR GROL ZHING GOS PA MED PA ZHES BYA
BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA DPA' BAR 'GRO BA ZHES BYA BA'I
TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE

'DZIN GANG GIS TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI SPYOD YUL LA SPYOD PA
STE, 'DI NI DPA' BAR 'GRO BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE
LA RIN CHEN PHYAG RGYA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA,
TING NGE 'DZIN GANG GIS TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD RGYAS BTAB PA
LTA BUR GYUR PA STE, 'DI NI RIN CHEN

PHYAG RGYA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA SENG GE RNAM
PAR RTZE BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE
'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI RNAM PAR
RTZE BA STE, 'DI NI SENG GE RNAM PAR RTZE BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING
NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA ZLA BA BZANG PO ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN
GANG ZHE NA, TING

NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD SNANG BAR
BYED PA STE, 'DI NI ZLA BA BZANG PO ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN
TO, ,DE LA ZLA BA'I RGYAL MTSAN TOG CES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN
GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN DE NI TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI
RGYAL MTSAN 'DZIN PA STE, 'DI NI ZLA BA'I RGYAL MTSAN TOG CES

@219B BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA CHOS THAMS CAD LAS SHIN
TU 'PHAGS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE
'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI MNGON PAR
'PHAGS PA STE, 'DI NI CHOS THAMS CAD LAS SHIN TU 'PHAGS PA ZHES
BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA SPYI

GTZUG RNAM PAR LTA BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA,
TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI
SPYI GTZUG RNAM PAR LTA BA STE, 'DI NI SPYI GTZUG RNAM PAR LTA BA
ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA CHOS KYI DBYINGS SU NGES
PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE

'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING CHOS KYI DBYINGS SU RTOG PAR 'GRO BA
STE, 'DI NI CHOS KYI DBYINGS SU NGES PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE
'DZIN TO, ,DE LA NGES PA'I RGYAL MTSAN TOG CES BYA BA'I TING NGE
'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE
'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI RGYAL MTSAN NGES PAR

'DZIN PA STE, 'DI NI NGES PA'I RGYAL MTSAN TOG CES BYA BA'I TING
NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG
ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS
CAD KYIS 'JIG PAR MI 'GYUR BA STE, 'DI NI RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA'I
TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA CHOS THAMS CAD

LA 'JUG PA'I PHYAG RGYA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA,
TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING CHOS THAMS CAD KYI PHYAG RGYA
LA 'JUG PA STE, 'DI NI CHOS THAMS CAD KYI PHYAG RGYA LA 'JUG PA
ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA TING NGE 'DZIN LA RGYAL
PO LTAR RAB TU GNAS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING

'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE
'DZIN THAMS CAD LA RGYAL PO LTAR RAB TU GNAS PA STE, 'DI NI TING
NGE 'DZIN LA RGYAL PO LTAR RAB TU GNAS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE
'DZIN TO, ,DE LA 'OD ZER RAB TU 'GYED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE
'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA

GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI 'OD ZER RAB TU 'GYED PA
STE, 'DI NI 'OD ZER RAB TU 'GYED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN
TO, ,DE LA DPUNG RTZAM PAR BKOD PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN
GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN
THAMS CAD KYI STOBS RNAM PAR BKOD PA STE,

@220A *, ,'DI NI DPUNG RNAM PAR BGOD PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE
'DZIN TO, ,DE LA YANG DAG PAR 'PHAGS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE
'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE
'DZIN THAMS CAD YANG DAG PAR 'PHAGS PAR 'GYUR PA STE, 'DI NI YANG
DAG PAR 'PHAGS

PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA NGES PA'I TSIG LA GDON
MI ZA BAR 'JUG PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING
NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI NGES
PA'I TSIG BSTAN PA LA 'JUG PA STE, 'DI NA NGES PA'I TSIG LA GDON
MI ZA BAR 'JUG PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE

'DZIN TO, ,DE LA TSIG BLA DAGS LA YANG DAG PAR 'JUG PA ZHES BYA

NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA

NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD

ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA
GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD

MNYAM PAR MI 'GYUR BA STE, 'DI NI NYAMS PA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I
TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA CHOS THAMS CAD YANG DAG PAR 'DU BA RGYA
MTSO'I PHYAG RGYA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING
NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD 'DU ZHING
KHONG DU CHUD PAR 'DOD PA STE,

'DI NI CHOS THAMS CAD YANG DAG PAR 'DU BA RGYA MTSO'I PHYAG RGYA
ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA NAM MKHA' RGYAS PAR
'GENGS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE
'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYIS NAM MKHA'
RGYAS PAR 'GENGS PA STE, 'DI NI NAM

@220B MKHA' RGYAS PAR 'GENGS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO,
,DE LA RDO RJE'I DKYIL 'KHOR ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG
ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS
CAD KYI DKYIL 'KHOR YONGS SU 'DZIN PA STE, 'DI NI RDO RJE'I DKYIL
'KHOR ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,

DE LA GZI BRJID DANG LDAN PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG
ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS
CAD GZI BRJID DANG BLOS 'BAR PAR BYED PA STE, 'DI NI GZI BRJID
DANG LDAN PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA TSAD MED PAR
SNANG BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA,

TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD TSAD
MED PAR SNANG BA STE, 'DI NI TSAD MED PAR SNANG BA ZHES BYA BA'I
TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA CHAGS PA DANG SGRIB PA MED PA ZHES BYA
BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS
SHING CHAGS PA THAMS CAD DANG BRAL BA NYID

LA BRTEN NAS TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD SGRIB PA MED PAR SNANG STE,
'DI NI CHAGS PA DANG SGRIB PA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN
TO, ,DE LA CHOS THAMS CAD KYI 'JUG PA CHAD PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING
NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING CHOS
THAMS CAD LA 'JUG PA YANG DAG PAR GCOD PA

STE, 'DI NI CHOS THAMS CAD LA 'JUG PA CHAD PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING
NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA NYON MONGS PA SDONG BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING
NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING NYON
MONGS PA THAMS CAD KYI DRI MA RAB TU SEL BA STE, 'DI NI NYON
MONGS PA SPONG BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA

RNAM PAR SNANG BYED CES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING
NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD LHAM ME LTA
NA NI LHANG NGER BYED PA STE, 'DI NI RNAM PAR SNANG BYED CES BYA
BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA TSOL BA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING
NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING CHOS

GANG LA YANG TSOL BA MED PA STE, 'DI NI TSOL BA MED PA ZHES BYA
BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA GNAS LA BRTEN PA MED PA ZHES BYA
BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS
SHING CHOS GANG YANG GNAS LA BRTEN PAR YANG DAG PAR RJES SU MI
MTHONG BA STE, 'DI NI GNAS LA BRTEN PA MED PA

@221A *, ,ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA SEMS MED PA
ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA
GNAS SHING SEMS MI 'BYUNG SEMS LAS BYUNG BA RNAMS KYANG MI RGYU
BA STE, 'DI NI SEMS MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE
LA DRI MA MED PA'I SGRON MA ZHES BYA

SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI SGRON MA DRI MA MED PAR BYED

GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING 'OD MTHA' YAS

PAR BYED PA STE, 'DI NI 'OD MTHA' YAS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE
'DZIN TO, ,DE LA 'OD BYED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG

MA THAG TU TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI 'OD BYED PA STE, 'DI NI
'OD BYED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO,,

DE LA KUN TU SNANG BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA,

DAM PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE

'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI DRI MA SEL BA STE, 'DI NI 'OD

SGRON MA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA ZAD MI SHES PA
ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA
GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD ZAD MI SHES PAR

@221B YANG DAG PAR RJES SU MTHONG NAS CHOS RDUL TZAM YANG YANG
DAG PAR RJES SU MI MTHONG STE, 'DI NI ZAD MI SHES PA ZHES BYA

'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE
'DZIN THAMS CAD MI G-YO MI 'GUL RAB TU MI 'BYED

RLOM SEMS SU MI BYED PA STE, 'DI NI MI G-YO BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING

NI 'JIG PA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I

GANG LA

GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI YE SHES TOG YANG

'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE
'DZIN THAMS CAD NGES PAR 'JIG CING TING NGE 'DZIN NYID KYANG YANG
DAG PAR RJES SU MI MTHONG BA STE, 'DI NI RDO RJE LTA BU

@222A *, ,ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA SEMS GNAS PA
ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA
GNAS SHING SEMS MI G-YO, ,RNAM PAR MI G-YO, ,RNAM PAR MI LDOG
,YONGS SU YI CHAD PAR MI 'GYUR, NYAMS SU MI BDE BA MED PA DE LA
SEMS ZHES

BYA BA 'DI YIN ZHES BYA BAR SEMS MI 'BYUNG BA STE, 'DI NI SEMS
GNAS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA KUN TU SNANG BA
ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA
GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD SNANG BAR YANG DAG PAR RJES
SU MTHONG BA STE, 'DI NI KUN TU SNANG BA ZHES

BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS
SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD LA RAB TU GNAS PAR 'GYUR BA STE,
'DI NI LEGS PAR RAB TU GNAS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO,
,DE LA RIN CHEN MTHA' ZHES BYA BA'I

TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD RIN CHEN MTHA' LTAR KUN NAS SNANG BA
STE, 'DI NI RIN CHEN MTHA' ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE
LA CHOS DAM PA'I PHYAG RGYA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE
NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD

PHYAG RGYA MED PA'I MTHAS PHYAG RGYAS BTAB PA NYE BAR GZUNGS GDAB
PAR 'GYUR BA STE, 'DI NI CHOS DAM PA'I PHYAG RGYA ZHES BYA BA'I
TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA CHOS THAMS CAD MNYAM PA NYID CES BYA
BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS
SHING CHOS GANG YANG MNYAM PA NYID DU MA CHUD PA

MED PAR YANG DAG PAR RJES SU MTHONG BA STE, 'DI NI CHOS THAMS CAD

SPONG BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN
GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD DANG, CHOS THAMS CAD
KYI DGA' BA SPONG BA STE, 'DI NI

DGA' BA SPONG BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA CHOS
THAMS CAD 'PHAGS PAS KHENGS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG
ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING CHOS THAMS CAD YANG DAG
PAR 'PHAGS PAR 'GYUR ZHING, CHOS THAMS CAD KYIS KUN TU KHENGS PAR
'GYUR BA STE, 'DI NI

@222B CHOS THAMS CAD 'PHAGS PAS KHENGS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE
'DZIN TO, ,DE LA RNAM PAR 'THOR BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN
GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN
THAMS CAD KYI CHOS THAMS CAD RNAM PAR 'THOR ZHING RNAM PAR SEL
BAR BYED PA STE, 'DI NI CHOS THAMS CAD RNAM

PAR 'THOR BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA CHOS THAMS
CAD KYI TSIG RAB TU 'BYED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG
ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS
CAD DANG CHOS THAMS CAD KYI TSIG RAB TU 'BYED PA STE, 'DI NI CHOS
THAMS CAD KYI TSIG RAB TU 'BYED PA ZHES BYA

BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA YI GE MNYAM PAR 'GOD PA ZHES BYA
BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS
SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI YI GE MNYAM PA NYID RAB TU
'THOB PA STE, 'DI NI YI GE MNYAM PAR 'GOD PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING
NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA YI GE DANG BRAL BA ZHES

BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS
SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI YI GE GCIG KYANG DMIGS PA MED
PA STE, 'DI NI YI GE DANG BRAL BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN
TO, ,DE LA DMIGS PA GCOD PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE
NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS

SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI DMIGS PA CHAD PAR 'GYUR BA
STE, 'DI NI DMIGS PA GCOD PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE
LA 'GYUR BA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING
NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING CHOS THAMS CAD 'GYUR BA MI DMIGS TE,
'DI NI 'GYUR BA MED PA

ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA RNAM PA MED PA ZHES BYA
BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS
SHING CHOS THAMS CAD KYI RNAM PA TZAM YANG DMIGS PA MED PA STE,
'DI NI RNAM PA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA
MING DANG MTSAN MA MED PA LA 'JUG PA ZHES BYA

BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS
SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI MING DANG MTSAN MA YANG DAG
PAR RJES SU MI MTHONG BA STE, 'DI NI MING DANG MTSAN MA MED PA LA
'JUG PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA GNAS MED PAR
SPYOD PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA,

@223A *, ,TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS
CAD KYI GNAS DMIGS PA MED PA STE, 'DI NI GNAS MED PAR SPYOD PA
ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA RAB RIB DANG BRAL BA ZHES
BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS
SHING CHOS THAMS CAD KYI RAB RIB

RNAM PAR SEL BA STE, 'DI NI RAB RIB DANG BRAL BA ZHES BYA BA'I
TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA SPYOD PA DANG LDAN PA ZHES BYA BA'I
TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING
TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI SPYOD PA YANG DAG PAR RJES SU MI
MTHONG BA STE, 'DI NI SPYOD PA DANG LDAN PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING
NGE 'DZIN

TO, ,DE LA SPYOD PA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE
NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD
G-YO BA MED PAR YANG DAG PAR RJES SU MTHONG BA STE, 'DI NI SPYOD
PA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA YUL LAS BRGAL
BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING

NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI SPYOD
YUL LAS YANG DAG PAR 'DA' BA STE, 'DI NI YUL LAS BRGAL BA ZHES
BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA YON TAN THAMS CAD KYI TSOGS SU
'GYUR BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN
GANG LA GNAS SHING CHOS

THAMS CAD TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI YON TAN GYI TSOGS RJES SU
'THOB PA STE, 'DI NI YON TAN THAMS CAD KYI TSOGS SU GYUR PA ZHES
BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA SEMS MED PAR GNAS PA ZHES BYA
BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS
SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD LA SEMS

MI 'JUG PA STE, 'DI NI SEMS MED PAR GNAS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING
NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA DGE BA'I ME TOG RGYAS SHING 'PHEL BA ZHES
BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS
SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI DGE BA'I ME TOG RGYAS SHING
'PHEL BAR RAB TU 'THOB PA STE, 'DI NI DGE

'DZIN TO, ,DE LA BYANG CHUB KYI YAN LAG DANG LDAN PA ZHES BYA
BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS
SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI BYANG CHUB KYI YAN LAG RAB TU
'THOB PA STE, 'DI NI BYANG CHUB KYI YAN LAG DANG LDAN PA

@223B ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA SPOBS PA MTHA' YAS

PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA CHOS THAMS CAD LAS
'DA' BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN

GNAS SHING CHOS THAMS CAD

CAD NYON MONGS PA MED PAR YANG DAG PAR

@225B BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA GNAS DMIGS SU MED PA LA
BRTZON PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE
'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI KUN GZHI
NYE BAR MI DMIGS PA STE, 'DI NI GNAS DMIGS SU MED PA LA BRTZON PA
ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA DE BZHIN

NYID LA GNAS SHING SEMS MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG
ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS
CAD KYI DE BZHIN NYID LAS PHYIR MI LDOG PA STE, 'DI NI DE BZHIN
NYID LA GNAS SHING SEMS MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO,
,DE LA LUS KYI SKYON YANG DAG PAR SEL BA

ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA
GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD KYI LUS MI DMIGS PA STE, 'DI
NI LUS KYI SKYON YANG DAG PAR SEL BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN
TO, ,DE LA NGAG GI SKYON RNAM PAR 'JIG PAS NAM MKHA' LTAR GYUR PA
ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG

ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS
CAD KYI NGAG GI LAS MI DMIGS PA STE, 'DI NI NGAG GI SKYON RNAM
PAR 'JIG PAS NAM MKHA' LTAR GYUR PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN
TO, ,DE LA NAM MKHA' LTAR CHAGS PA MED PAS RNAM PAR GROL ZHING
GOS PA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING

NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA GNAS SHING CHOS
THAMS CAD NAM MKHA' LTAR CHAGS PA MED PAS RNAM PAR GROL ZHING GOS
PA MED PA 'THOB PA STE, 'DI NI NAM MKHA' LTAR CHAGS PA MED PAS
RNAM PAR GROL ZHING GOS PA MED PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN
TO, ,RAB 'BYOR 'DI NI BYANG CHUB

SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA
SPYOD PA'I THEG PA CHEN PO'O ZHES BYA BA NI BSOD NAMS KYI TSOGS
SO, ,RAB 'BYOR GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN
PO'I THEG PA CHEN PO NI 'DI LTA STE, DRAN PA NYE BAR GZHAG PA
BZHI STE, BZHI GANG ZHE NA,

LUS DRAN PA NYE BAR GZHAG PA DANG, TSOR BA DRAN PA NYE BAR GZHAG
PA DANG, SEMS DRAN PA NYE BAR GZHAG PA DANG, CHOS DRAN PA NYE BAR
GZHAG PA'O, ,DE LA LUS DRAN PA NYE BAR GZHAG PA GANG ZHE NA, RAB
'BYOR 'DI LA BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO BRTUN PA DANG
LDAN PA, DRAN

@226A *, ,PA DANG LDAN PA, SHES BZHIN CAN DRAN PA DANG LDAN PAS
'JIG RTEN LA CHAGS SEMS DANG YID MI BDE BA RNAM PAR BSAL NAS NANG
GI LUS LA LUS KYI RJES SU LTA ZHING DE YANG MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL
GYIS GNAS TE, LUS DANG LDAN PA'I RNAM PAR RTOG PA LA RNAM PAR MI
RTOG GO, ,

PHYI'I LUS LA LUS KYI RJES SU LTA ZHING DE YANG MI DMIGS PA'I
TSUL GYIS GNAS TE, LUS DANG LDAN PA'I RNAM PAR RTOG PA LA RNAM
PAR MI RTOG GO, ,PHYI NANG GI LUS LA LUS KYI RJES SU LTA ZHING DE
YANG MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS TE, LUS DANG LDAN PA'I RNAM PAR
RTOG PA LA RNAM PAR MI RTOG GO,

DE BZHIN DU NANG GI TSOR BA DANG SEMS DANG CHOS LA CHOS KYI RJES
SU LTA ZHING DE YANG MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS TE CHOS DANG
LDAN PA'I RNAM PAR RTOG PA LA RNAM PAR MI RTOG GO, ,PHYI'I TSOR
BA DANG SEMS DANG CHOS LA CHOS KYI RJES SU LTA ZHING DE YANG MI
DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS TE CHOS DANG LDAN PA'I

RNAM PAR RTOG PA LA RNAM PAR MI RTOG GO, ,PHYI NANG GI TSOR BA
DANG SEMS DANG CHOS LA CHOS KYI RJES SU LTA ZHING DE YANG MI
DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS TE, CHOS DANG LDAN PA'I RNAM PAR RTOG
PA LA RNAM PAR MI RTOG GO, ,RAB 'BYOR JI LTAR NA BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO NANG GI

LUS LA LUS KYI RJES SU LTA ZHING GNAS SHE NA, RAB 'BYOR 'DI LA
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO 'GRO NA 'GRO'O ZHES BYA
BAR RAB TU SHES SO, ,'GRENG NA 'GRENG NGO ZHES BYA BAR RAB TU
SHES SO, ,'DUG NA 'DUG GO ZHES BYA BAR RAB TU SHES SO, ,NYAL NA
NYAL LO ZHES BYA BAR RAB TU SHES SO, ,

LUS DE GYA NOM PA'AM GYA NOM PA MA YIN PAR GNAS PA DE LTA DE LTAR
RAB TU SHES SO, ,RAB 'BYOR DE LTAR NA BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS
DPA' CHEN PO BRTUN PA DANG LDAN PA SHES BZHIN CAN DRAN PA DANG
LDAN PA 'JIG RTEN LA CHAGS SEMS DANG YID MI BDE BA RNAM PAR BSAL
NAS NANG GI LUS LA LUS

KYI RJES SU LTA ZHING DE YANG MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS TE,
LUS DANG LDAN PA'I RNAM PAR RTOG PA LA RNAM PAR MI RTOG PA YIN
NO, ,RAB 'BYOR GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO
NANG GI LUS LA LUS KYI RJES SU LTA ZHING GNAS PA NI 'GRO 'AM LDOG
KYANG SHES BZHIN DU SPYOD PA

@226B YIN, KUN TU LTA BA'AM RNAM PAR LTA BA YANG SHES BZHIN DU
SPYOD PA YIN, BSKUM PA DANG, BRKYANG BA DANG, SNAM SBYAR DANG,
LHUNG BZED DANG, CHOS GOS THOGS PA DANG, ZA BA DANG, 'THUNG BA
DANG, 'CHA' BA DANG, NYAL BA DANG, GNYID KYIS NON PA BSANG BA

BRTZON 'GRUS KYI DBANG PO DANG,

RAB KYI DBANG PO STE, RAB 'BYOR DE YANG MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I THEG PA CHEN PO'O, ,RAB
'BYOR GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I THEG PA
CHEN PO NI

'DI LTA STE, STOBS LNGA STE, LNGA GANG ZHE NA, DAD PA'I STOBS
DANG, BRTZON 'GRUS KYI STOBS DANG, DRAN PA'I STOBS DANG, TING NGE
'DZIN GYI STOBS DANG, SHES RAB KYI STOBS TE, RAB 'BYOR 'DI YANG
DE MI DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN
PO'I THEG PA CHEN

PO'O, ,RAB 'BYOR GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN

LA
